definition: for all eternity/throughout all ages/eternity (used in an elegiac couplet, wreath etc dedicated to the dead)
to chant/to recite/to moan/to groan/cry (of certain animals and insects)/song (ancient poem)
the sun and moon/day and month/every day and every month/season/life and livelihood
